participant_1.background:
I use makeup to help me feel more confident and powerful, even when my back is hurting.
i like doing art projects.
i trust in god.
I sometimes think I am too busy to keep up with my family, but I try my best because I love them.

participant_2.background:
I spend my weekends reading fantasy novels and watching Game of Thrones.
I'm still living with my parents while I save up for my own place.
I want to learn how to train my dog to behave in a new country.
i m an actress and i work at a grocery store.
i think i ll be famous one day.

content.text: Hey there! What are you up to today?
I'm doing good! Just reading a fantasy novel and hanging out with my dog.
Oh that sounds fun! I love reading fantasy novels, what are you reading right now?
I'm reading The Wheel of Time series by Robert Jordan. It's really good so far!
Oh I've heard of that one! I've been meaning to read it but I haven't gotten around to it yet.
You should definitely check it out! It's a great series.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to do art projects, fly kites, and spend time with my family.
Oh that sounds like fun! I like to do art projects too. I also like to read and watch Game of Thrones.
Oh I love Game of Thrones! I'm so excited for the new season to come out.
Me too! I'm not sure how I'm going to wait until it comes out.
I know right? It's going to be so good!
I'm sure it will be!
So what do you do for work?
I'm an actress and I work at a grocery store.
Oh that's cool! I've always wanted to be an actress.
It's a lot of fun but it can be hard work.
I bet! But it's definitely worth it if you love it.
Exactly!
Well it was nice chatting with you! Have a great day!
You too!
